summary: This is an email chain regarding the provision of a laptop to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell (Reg. No. 02879-509) at a Bureau of Prisons facility. The document is administrative in nature, focusing on logistics and authorization for the equipment.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the inmate for whom a laptop is being requested or provided, as indicated by her registration number (02879-509).

events.title: Laptop Request for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An email correspondence regarding the provision of a laptop to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell at a Bureau of Prisons facility.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was an inmate with registration number 02879-509 as of November 2020.
The Bureau of Prisons was involved in administrative correspondence regarding providing her with a laptop.
The email originated from a US Department of Justice domain (usa.doj.gov).
